name: HORDE (Fear-games, LittleLionGirls, sidlovatt)
description:
HORDE was made in 24 hours for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme "Delay the inevitable"

Ever wonder what it would be like to be a zombie? Now you can find out!

In Horde, you create your own army of zombies and set out on a quest for revenge against the man who created you. To do this, you’ll need to build up your army. Luckily, that’s pretty easy—just kill some humans. That’ll create more zombies for your horde, so the bigger your horde is, the easier it will be to defeat the villainous tycoon and win the game.

HOW TO PLAY A and D to steer your Zombie. Kill the goal amount of Humans and defeat the final villain to win.

Artwork by Julia & Sid
Programming by Callum & Julia
